adjectives.description: changeable (comparative more changeable, superlative most changeable)

examples: Synonyms: alterable, modifiable, variable; see also Thesaurus:mutable

entries.meaning: Subject to sudden or frequent changes.
examples: Synonyms: fickle, labile, variable; see also Thesaurus:changeable
The weather is very changeable today: we've had bright sunshine, clouds, wind and rain in the same half-hour.

entries.meaning: (of a species) Capable of camouflaging itself by changing colour.
